name: Richard Hua
title: Global Strategist & Innovation Evangelist
aboutMe: Rich Hua is a global strategist and innovation evangelist for Amazon Web Services. He has spent decades training and mentoring people in leadership and interpersonal skillsâ€”from CEOs to aspiring managers to young professionals. Rich has trained tens of thousands of Amazonians on emotional and social intelligence and delivered some of the most popular and highly-rated talks within Amazon. His EQ training is now an integral part of onboarding for all new AWS employees in the U.S.

name: Carolyn DeLena
title: HR Program Manager
aboutMe: I have been working in the HR field in a variety of roles. My passion for HR comes from my need to help others and ensure an exceptional employee experience. My current role offers me the unique opportunity to streamline cyclical HR processes, and to build out programs that fill employee needs.

name: Savita Belgaonkar
title: Software Development Manager
aboutMe: An experienced technical leader with a passion to increase women technologist population and build diversity.

name: Charis Loveland
title: AI/ML Business Development Manager
aboutMe: Charis Loveland works at AWS as a business development manager on the cloud intelligence team specializing in artificial intelligence and machine learning (ML). She has a decade and a half of experience in product management, AI, data analytics, new product introduction, file and hardware storage, and software development. After launching a crowdsourcing platform for Azure ML at Microsoft, Charis founded Rue La La's data science team where she created and executed a roadmap and strategy to create personalized experiences and segment customers. Charis co-founded an ML startup and has taught several business courses at General Assembly as well as online courses about data science at MIT, Dartmouth, and Columbia. Charis serves as a coding instructor, mentor, and advocate for early STEM education and volunteers for several nonprofits that help promote greater diversity in the technology industry.

name: Liat Berry
title: Technical Product Manager
aboutMe: Liat Berry is a technical product manager at Amazon Web Services, leading initiatives in the storage and cloud computing space. Prior to AWS Liat was spearheading Natural Language Understanding and Automatic Speech Recognition model development for the Alexa Machine Learning team. Liat has a diverse background including hardware engineering for Apple, EZ-Chip and Mellanox, and business strategy work at Santander bank. She holds a BSc in Electrical Engineering from the Technion and an MBA from the Harvard Business School.
